entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:22 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
